name: mirada
description: Node.js and Browser high level OpenCv API. Base on OpenCv.js with support for npm, TypeScript and a a single easy to use API compatible with Node.js and browser

scripts.test: npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config.js
scripts.test-js: npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config-js.js
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.copy: cp -r static/opencv.js dist/src && rm -rf dist/src/types/opencv && mkdir -p dist/src/types/opencv && cp -r src/types/opencv/* dist/src/types/opencv
scripts.docs: npm run docs-readme-toc && npm run docs-api
scripts.docs-api: rm -rf ./api && mkdir -p ./api && typedoc  --ignoreCompilerErrors --theme markdown --out ./api --readme none --excludeNotExported src/index.ts
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc&& npm run copy
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && npm run test-js && npm run test-browser && npm run docs
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m 'version patch' && npm version patch && npm publish
